list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of metal or other material, curved or bent back at an angle, for catching hold of or hanging things on.
a thing designed to catch people's attention.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: companies are looking for a sales hook
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các công ty đang tìm kiếm một hook bán hàng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a curved cutting instrument, especially as used for reaping or shearing.
a short swinging punch made with the elbow bent, especially in boxing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a perfectly timed right hook to the chin
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một móc phải thời gian hoàn hảo cho cằm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a curved promontory or sand spit.
attach or fasten with a hook or hooks.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the truck had a red lamp hooked to its tailgate
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chiếc xe tải có một chiếc đèn màu đỏ được nối với cổng sau của nó
anh ấy đã nối một chiếc pike 24 lb

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: attract and hold the attention of; captivate.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I was hooked by John's radical zeal
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi bị cuốn hút bởi sự nhiệt thành gốc của John

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: strike (the ball) or play (a stroke) so that the ball deviates in the direction of the follow-through, typically inadvertently.
push (the ball) backward with the foot from the front line in a scrum.
